title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding.

Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set externalize text in the chart title.
OB: The key is left blank in the properties file.
EB: In the properties file, setting the key to blank, but with a valid value, should still allow the text to be externalized in the chart title.
SR: Set externalize text in the chart title.
